page.title: 05A farmer's daughter.(cont'd)
page.content: I decided to climb a treee.It was easy to climb the elm tree because it has nails in.I have carved my name in the tree.I looked at my watch,it was 5 o'clock;When I had my tea I watched television.Then it was time to go to bed. On a school day I get up at quarter to eight and get all my school things ready.After I had got all my school things ready,I had my breakfast,then it was time to go to school.On Tuesday morning I did my Spellaway then our teacher wrote our spellings on the blackboard for us to copy.Then it was dinnertime.We normally have a cooked dinner and a pudding to follow.We sometimes have water to drink.After lunch we have a big playtime.After playtime we have History with Mrs. Fraser then it is play again.After that we just carry on with our history
